text: Ikiavɨra Itir God ua na mɨgɨa ghaze, “Jeremaia, nɨ mangɨ kamaghɨn Israelia mɨkɨm suam, ‘Ikiavɨra Itir God, a Israelian God, a kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze: Gumazamiziba wainɨn dɨpam isa nguazir mɨnebagh fusfuzɨ da izefe.’ Eghtɨ Jerusalemia ti oregh nɨ mɨkɨm suam, ‘Nɨ ghaze, e ti bizir kam gɨfozir puvatɨ, a?’
